MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: shutdown reboot scheduled schedule timed time logoff
English.Char_Desc_80: A utility to schedule shutdowns, reboots and logoffs
English.Char_Desc_250: Shutdown Timer is an easy to use utility than allows you to schedule a shutdown, reboot or logoff. These actions can be carried out at any scheduled time in the future, from 1 minute to 1+ years
English.Char_Desc_450: Shutdown Timer is an easy to use utility than allows you to schedule a shutdown, reboot or logoff. These actions can be carried out at any scheduled time in the future, from 1 minute to 1+ years
English.Char_Desc_2000: Shutdown Timer is an easy to use utility than allows you to schedule a shutdown, reboot or logoff. These actions can be carried out at any scheduled time in the future, from 1 minute to 1+ years. Scheduling of Shutdown. Scheduling of Reboot. Scheduling of Logoff. Scheduling of Logoff (force). Scheduling of Lock PC. Scheduling of Standy. Scheduling of Hibernate. Ability to abort any of the schedules until they are executed. Simple, clear, easy to use interface. Works on XP, Vista and Windows 7

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: Clone may be distributed by any 3rd party as long as the installation file remains the same as :- http://newtonsoftware.co.uk/shutdowntimer/shutdowntimersetup.msi
